metadata.name: Where unicorns are born - Hiveshibuya OPENDAY Live Performance Works
metadata.description:
This is a live performance piece that took place at Hiveshibuya OPENDAY on August 31, 2022.
This piece is to wish good luck to the entrepreneurs who gathered at Dogenzaka in Tokyo.

Hiyoko Shisho Twitter account: https://twitter.com/hiyoko_shisho
Hiyoko Shisho VR Artworks https://bal-inc.jp/hiyoko/
